name: Magical Tetris Challenge
overview:
A recent version of the classic puzzle game. This version contains your favorite Disney characters as they battle it out in competitive play.

This is Capcom's version of the classic russian puzzle game, Tetris. You take the role of your favorite Disney character: Mickey, Minnie, Donald or Goofy, to play a competitive battle against your opponent. Not only do the original seven Tetris blocks appear, but many bonus blocks as well in a variety of shapes and sizes. Another feature is the shadow mode where you can see where your block will fall before it reaches the bottom. This makes it easier for unskilled players as well as children.
